description: This file defines the UserEntity class, representing a user in the banking system with fields such as id, firstName, lastName, email, identificationNumber, and a list of associated bank accounts. It uses JPA annotations for ORM mapping.

classes.name: UserEntity
classes.description: Entity class representing a system user with personal details and associated bank accounts, mapped to the 'banking_core_user' database table.

methods.name: getFirstName
methods.description: Getter for the user's first name.

methods.name: setFirstName
methods.description: Setter for the user's first name.

methods.name: getLastName
methods.description: Getter for the user's last name.

methods.name: setLastName
methods.description: Setter for the user's last name.

methods.name: getIdentificationNumber
methods.description: Getter for the user's identification number.

methods.name: setIdentificationNumber
methods.description: Setter for the user's identification number.

methods.name: getAccounts
methods.description: Getter for the list of bank accounts associated with the user.

methods.name: setAccounts
methods.description: Setter for the list of bank accounts.
